2012 NBA Playoffs Summary

2011 Playoffs Summary 2013 Playoffs Summary

League Champion: Miami Heat

Finals MVP: LeBron James (28.6 / 10.2 / 7.4)


2012 Playoff Leaders:

PTS: LeBron James (697)

TRB: LeBron James (224)

AST: Rajon Rondo (227)

WS: LeBron James (5.8)
